aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
SRhonyra Radeon RX 580 8GB White PCB gaming graphics card 
Gaming the best with SRhonyra RX 580 8GB video card (White PCB Edition) 
The SRhonyra RX 580 8GB graphics card is a great option for those looking for an affordable graphics card that offers good performance and value. 
It is still a capable graphics card that can handle most modern games and applications, providing a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience. This GPU has 8GB VRAM, which is still enough for most games, even those with high graphics settings, ensuring smooth gameplay without any lag or stuttering. 
Moreover, the power consumption of SRhonyra RX 580 8GB video card is around 100 ~ 120 Watts, which means it can be used with lower-powered systems or with a lower wattage power supply. You don't need to upgarde your PSU. 
The RX 580 8GB graphics card is compatible with a wide range of systems and motherboards, making it an easy upgrade option for many users. AMD continues to release regular driver updates for the RX 580, improving performance and compatibility with newer games and applications. 
Its compatibility with a wide range of systems, good cooling solutions, and driver support make it an excellent choice for gamers, content creators, and other users who want a reliable graphics card that won't break the bank. 
Gaming the best and have fun! 
* Please note this GPU does not support Hackintosh Operating System. 
Semi-automatic Intelligent Fans System 
Semi-automatic intelligent fans system stops the fan completely when the GPU temperature remains below 55°C, letting you enjoy light gaming in complete silence. Paired 2 quiet ball bearing fan for longer life span. 
Optimized Composite Heatpipe 
SRhonyra RX 580 8gb gaming graphics card has 2 copper tubes that covered on the aluminum heat sink same as our RX 580 8gb, ensure the heat can be quickly transmitted to the air from the fan through the heat sink. 
High-Quality Components for stable performance 
This gaming graphics card is built with high-quality components that ensure its high performance, reliable and durable capability for all kinds of gamer.

description: XFX Radeon RX 580 GTS XXX Edition 1386MHz OC+, 8GB GDDR5, VR Ready, Dual BIOS, 3xDP HDMI DVI, AMD Graphics Card (RX-580P8DFD6) Product description (optional): XFX Radeon RX 580 GTS XXX Edition 1386MHz OC+, 8GB GDDR5, VR Ready, Dual BIOS, 3xDP HDMI DVI, AMD Graphics Card (RX-580P8DFD6) XFX Dual BIOS Mining - We know enthusiast like options, our RX 570 and 580 graphics cards are shipped with a Dual BIOS. If you want optimal gaming performance just install it and go. For cryptocurrency mining, simply shut the system down and flip the BIOS switch on the card. Our mining BIOS is already tuned to give increased mining hashrates without hassle. Radeon CHILL Technology - Radeon Chill is an intelligent power-saving feature for Radeon graphics that dynamically regulates framerate based on your movement’s in-game. During peak gameplay, Radeon Chill works to deliver the full framerate potential of Radeon graphics. As movement decreases, Radeon Chill reduces your gameplay framerate. Designed to save power, lower temperature, and increase GPU life, Radeon Chill enables high performance graphics when you battle and saves power when you explore. High Performance Unibody Heatsink - The XFX RX RS series features our all new Unibody VRM Heatsink construction enable direct transfer to the primary heatsink and heat pipes. This unique combination of material and construction enhances thermal efficiency by a total of 40%. XFX Exclusive Ultra Low Noise XL Inductors - GPU inductors are notoriously noisy with that tiny buzzing noise caused by traditional low quality inductors but XFX's exclusive premium quality XL Inductors utilize multiple layers to seal the Inductors completely and securely nearly eliminating inductor noise.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
XFX True Clock Technology 
BIOS Controlled overclocking. 
Software controlled clock speeds can be hindered by overall computer performance. XFX's True Clock however is hardware controlled clock speed performance optimization, so your card is always running at an optimized performance level 
XFX OC+ Capable 
Going Beyond True Clock. 
While True Clock locks in a super fast optimal speed on a hardware level, RX Series cards with an OC+ rating are tested at the factory to go even beyond XFX's True Clock. We encourage you to try these factory tested speeds by using the simple to use AMD Wattman utility, letting you squeeze every last bit of performance out of your card. 
Enhanced VRM and Memory Cooling 
Cooling technologies don't stop at just the GPU. 
After countless hours of research, development, and testing our engineers have developed all new VRM and Memory cooling technology, reducing temperatures VRM by up to 30' C and GDDR temperatures by 20' C, all while reducing dB noise by an additional 5%.

features: NVIDIA Ampere Streaming Multiprocessors: The building blocks for the world’s fastest, most efficient GPU, the all-new Ampere SM brings 2X the FP32 throughput and improved power efficiency.
2nd Generation RT Cores: Experience 2X the throughput of 1st gen RT Cores, plus concurrent RT and shading for a whole new level of ray tracing performance.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer

ASUS is one of Fortune magazine’s World’s Most Admired Companies and is one of the top motherboard and gaming brands, as well as a top-three consumer notebook vendor. ASUS is driven by passion and innovation and dedicated to creating quality products for a future smart life, designing and manufacturing products that perfectly meet the needs of today's digital home, office and person. Our wide portfolio includes MG248Q, Chromebox and a range of devices and components, along with AR and VR. 
DUAL-RTX3060-O12G-V2 
ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 3060 V2 OC Edition with two powerful Axial-tech fans and a 2-slot design for broad compatibility 
NVIDIA Ampere Streaming Multiprocessors: As the building blocks for the world’s fastest, most efficient GPU, the all-new Ampere SM brings 2X the FP32 throughput and improved power efficiency. 
2nd Gen RT Cores: Experience 2X the throughput of 1st gen RT Cores, plus concurrent RT and shading for a whole new level of ray tracing performance. 
3rd Gen Tensor Cores: Get up to 2X the throughput w/structural sparsity and AI algorithms such as DLSS. For up to 8K resolution, they deliver a boost in game performance and new AI capabilities. 
OC mode: Boost clock 1867 MHz (OC mode)/ 1837 MHz (Gaming mode). 
Axial-Tech Fan Design has been tuned up with more fan blades and a reversed rotational direction for the center fan. 
Axial-tech Fan Design 
Better, Faster, Stronger 
Two tried-and-true Axial-tech fans feature a smaller hub that facilitates longer blades and a barrier ring to increase downward air pressure. 
0dB Technology 
Quiet Intelligence 
To eliminate unnecessary noise, a stop mode halts all fans when the GPU temp falls below 50 degrees and power consumption is low. 
2-slot Design 
Sink your Heat into This 
A carefully designed shroud, heatsink, and heatpipe layout allows the two Axial-tech fans to leverage chassis side-panel ventilation and deliver thermal performance that belies the card’s size. 
Auto-Extreme Technology 
Precision Automated Manufacturing 
Auto-Extreme Technology is an automated manufacturing process that sets new standards in the industry by allowing all soldering to be completed in a single pass. This reduces thermal strain on components and avoids the use of harsh cleaning chemicals, resulting in less environmental impact, lower manufacturing power consumption, and a more reliable product overall. 
Protective Backplate 
That's so metal! 
The PCB is reinforced by an aluminum backplate that adds structural rigidity, helping to prevent flex and protect components and trace pathways from damage. 
Stainless Steel Bracket 
Steel yourself 
The mounting bracket of the Dual has been beefed up with 304 Stainless Steel that’s harder and more resistant to corrosion. 
NVIDIA Ampere Architecture 
The all-new NVIDIA Ampere architecture delivers the ultimate play, featuring advanced 2nd generation Ray Tracing Cores and 3rd generation Tensor Cores with greater throughput. 
RTX. It's On! 
Experience today’s biggest blockbusters like never before with the visual fidelity of real-time ray tracing and the ultimate performance of AI-powered DLSS. 
DLSS AI Acceleration 
NVIDIA DLSS is groundbreaking AI rendering that boosts frame rates with uncompromised image quality using the dedicated AI processing Tensor Cores on the GeForce RTX. This gives you the performance headroom to crank up settings and resolutions for an incredible visual experience. The AI revolution has come to gaming.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
eGPU Breakaway Box 750ex - Thunderbolt 3 to eGPU Card Expansion Systems 
Pro Power Graphics - Add a High-performance Video Card to Create Your Own Personal eGPU Workstation 
Whether you’re editing, rendering, color grading, animating or creating special effects, many of the pro applications you use rely on desktop and workstation graphics (GPU) cards to do the heavy lifting in processing data. Unfortunately, many popular computers are equipped only with integrated graphics or low-power discrete GPUs that bottleneck performance when performing these tasks. Happily, there’s a simple path to greater productivity—add a Sonnet external GPU (eGPU). The eGPU Breakaway Box 750 and 750ex Thunderbolt 3 to GPU PCIe card expansion systems boost your eGPU-compatible computer’s graphics performance by connecting a high-performance GPU card to your computer via a single cable. 
Mac Compatibility 
Mac with Thunderbolt 3 ports and macOS 10.13.6
Apple M1 Macs do not support eGPUs
In an eGPU chassis, these cards are compatible with macOS 10.5.7 - macOS 12.2+
Window Compatibility 
Windows PC with a Thunderbolt 3 or Thunderbolt 4 port & GPU card use requires an eGPU-enabled Windows PC
Maximum GPU Card Size 312mm x 140 mm x 58mm 
iMac Pro Application Acceleration 
MacBook Pro Application Acceleration 
eGPU Breakaway Box 750ex - Compatibility 
750W Power Supply - Future-proof Upgrade 
Don’t limit your future card choices—choose a Sonnet eGPU Breakaway Box 750 or 750ex. Equipped with 750W power supplies, these Sonnet chassis easily support the highest power demands of latest GPUs and have plenty of extra power to support GPU cards from generations to come. 
eGPU Breakaway Box 750ex 
Includes two 8-pin (6+2 pin) auxiliary power connectors
750W power supply; supports cards requiring up to 375W of continuous power plus an additional 100W peak power
Provides 85W of upstream power (useful for charging your notebook)
AMD approved for the air-cooled editions of the AMD Radeon RX Vega 64, Radeon Pro WX 8200, and WX 9100
Designed and qualified to also support overclocked NVIDIA cards with high peak power requirements
More Ports, Additional Functionality: eGPU Breakaway Box 750ex 
Adds four 5Gb/s USB Type A ports to connect peripherals, plus an RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet port for a wired network connectivity. 
Is your computer short on ports for basic connectivity? Step up to the eGPU Breakaway Box 750ex to add four 5Gb/s USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type A ports to connect peripherals, plus an RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet port for a wired network connection. The 750ex features a dual Thunderbolt controller design, enabling it to support both peripherals and GPU card through the single Thunderbolt connection to your computer. 
Mac Compatibility 
Mac with Thunderbolt 3 ports and macOS 10.13.6+ Additional Features:
macOS drivers for NVIDIA GPU cards are not compatible with Thunderbolt Technology
One eGPU Breakaway Box (WX 9100, for example) supports up to six external 4k monitors @60Hz
Mac with Thunderbolt 3 ports and macOS 10.14.6+ Additional Features:
Support added for AMD RX 560 and AMD RX 590 GPUs
Support for two eGPU Breakaway Box eGPUs and up to twelve external 4k monitors @60Hz
Mac with Thunderbolt 3 ports and macOS 10.15.7+ Additional Features:
Support added for AMD RX 5500, 5500 XT, 5600, 5600 XT, 5700, 5700 XT
Apple M1 Macs do not support eGPUs
Window Compatibility 
Windows PC with a Thunderbolt 3 or Thunderbolt 4 port & GPU card use requires an eGPU-enabled Windows PC
4K to 8K Workflows – Connect Two or More Breakaway Boxes 
Many task times on supported applications—such as Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, and Maxon Cinema 4D, to name a few—can be cut significantly with one eGPU Breakaway Box connected. But, for computers with multiple Thunderbolt ports, times can be slashed when two, three, or four Breakaway Boxes are employed. Connecting one or more eGPUs can multiply your computer’s graphics processing power, enabling it to handle 4K, 5K, 6K, and 8K workflows more efficiently. 
Coolest & Quietest Add-your-own-card eGPU System Available 
With its large variable-speed temperature-controlled fan that quietly and effectively cools the installed card, the eGPU Breakaway Box can be comfortably used in noise-sensitive working environments. 
Supports Latest eGPU Cards 
No Compromise GPU Card Choice, designed to house and power the latest power-hungry video cards. They support Thunderbolt-compatible cards with popular GPU chipsets—such as AMD Radeon RX series (including VEGA GPUs); and NVIDIA GeForce series and TITAN GPUs. Even the latest pro cards—AMD Radeon Pro and NVIDIA Quadro GPUs—are supported! 
Two Models. Your Choice: 
Both eGPU Breakaway Box models are Thunderbolt Certified and include a Thunderbolt 3 cable to connect the system to your computer. The 750ex provides a handy connection hub for USB devices and Ethernet connectivity.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
TAKE THE ESSENTIALS 
VENTUS brings a fundamentally solid experience to users looking for a performance graphics card. A sharp-looking updated design with TORX FAN 4.0 and Airflow Control lets VENTUS breeze through any task. 
TORX FAN 4.0 
TORX FAN 4.0 is built on teamwork, with pairs of fan blades bound together with a linked outer ring design that focuses airflow into the Triple-Fan cooling system. 
AIRFLOW CONTROL 
Stay stealthy with Airflow Control which improves airflow dynamics. Deflectors provide additional surface area and guide air to where it’s needed for maximum cooling. 
CORE PIPE 
Core Pipes are precision-crafted to make maximum use of the available space. A squared section of heat pipes fully touch the GPU baseplate to then spread heat along the full length of the heatsink. 
ZERO FROZR 
The fans completely stop when temperatures are relatively low, eliminating all noise when active cooling is not needed. The fans will automatically start spinning again when the heat is on during gaming. 
FUSE 
Additional fuses built into the custom PCB provide additional safeguards against electrical damage. 
Ray Tracing 
The Ada architecture unleashes the full glory of ray tracing, which simulates how light behaves in the real world. With the power of RTX 40 Series and third-gen RT Cores, you can experience incredibly detailed virtual worlds like never before. 
NVIDIA DLSS 3 
DLSS is a revolutionary breakthrough in AI graphics that multiplies performance. Powered by the new fourth-gen Tensor Cores and Optical Flow Accelerator on GeForce RTX 40 Series GPUs, DLSS 3 uses AI to create additional frames and improve image quality. 
NVIDIA Reflex 
NVIDIA Reflex and GeForce RTX 40 Series GPUs deliver the lowest latency and best responsiveness for the ultimate competitive advantage. Built to optimize and measure system latency, Reflex provides faster target acquisition, quicker reaction times, and the best aim precision for competitive games.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer

ASUS is one of Fortune magazine’s World’s Most Admired Companies and is one of the top motherboard and gaming brands as well as a top-three consumer notebook vendor. ASUS is driven by passion and innovation and dedicated to creating quality products for a future smart life, designing and manufacturing products that perfectly meet the needs of today's digital home, office and person. Our wide portfolio includes MG248Q, Chromebox and a range of devices and components, along with AR and VR. 
ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 3050 OC Edition 6GB GDDR6 
ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 3050 OC Edition 6GB GDDR6 with two powerful fans AAA gaming performance and ray tracing 
NVIDIA Ampere Streaming Multiprocessors: The all-new Ampere SM brings 2X the FP32 throughput and improved power efficiency. 
2nd Generation RT Cores: Experience 2X the throughput of 1st gen RT Cores, plus concurrent RT and shading for a whole new level of ray-tracing performance. 
3rd Generation Tensor Cores: Get up to 2X the throughput w/structural sparsity & advanced AI algorithms such as DLSS. These cores deliver a boost in game performance & all-new AI capabilities. 
OC edition: Boost Clock 1537 MHz (OC Mode)/ 1507 MHz (Default Mode) 
IP5X dust resistance offers protection from particle ingress for better durability. 
A 2-slot design maximizes compatibility and cooling efficiency for superior performance in small chassis. 
A stainless steel bracket is harder and more resistant to corrosion. 
Auto-Extreme technology uses automation to enhance reliability. 
IP5X Dust Resistance 
Keep it clean 
Dust is a top enemy for fans. It’s easy to clean the blades, but taking the fan apart to remove dust that has made its way inside is not a simple task. Passing the IP5X certification means the housing is safe from nasty particulates, so you'll never need that deep clean.​ 
2-slot Design 
Sink your heat into this 
A carefully designed shroud, heatsink, and heatpipe layout allows the two fans to leverage chassis side-panel ventilation and deliver thermal performance that belies the card’s size. 
Auto-Extreme Technology 
Precision automated manufacturing 
Auto-Extreme Technology is an automated manufacturing process that sets new standards in the industry by allowing all soldering to be completed in a single pass. This reduces thermal strain on components and avoids the use of harsh cleaning chemicals, resulting in less environmental impact, lower manufacturing power consumption, and a more reliable product overall. 
Stainless Steel Bracket 
Steel yourself 
The mounting bracket of the Dual GeForce RTX 3050 6G has been beefed up with 304 Stainless Steel that is harder and more resistant to corrosion.​ 
Software Suite 
Harness the hardware 
Hardware and software come together to let you fully customize your experience and get the most out of your graphics card. GPU Tweak II allows for hardware tweaking and monitoring, and QuantumCloud utilizes your spare GPU computing power to generate passive income. 
NVIDIA G-SYNC Technology 
Smooth operator 
This graphics card supports NVIDIA G-SYNC display technology for a super-smooth variable refresh rate experience. Enjoy AAA games without the nuisance of screen tearing or stuttering.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Technologies 
AMD Radeon Software 
Radeon Software has been designed to provide you with a clean, modern and easy-to-use interface where you can quickly access the latest software features, game stats, performance reports, driver updates, and much more - all from one convenient location. Take advantage of the ALT+R hotkey to open Radeon Software directly in-game, making it even more convenient and easy to adjust your favorite features and get a fantastic gaming experience. 
AMD FreeSync Technology 
AMD FreeSync technology puts an end to choppy gameplay and broken frames with fluid, artifact-free performance at virtually any framerate. Behold the next breakthrough in PC and console gaming experiences. 
AMD Radeon Chill 
Keep your system running cool and quiet by enabling Radeon Chill. This power saving feature helps save your battery by regulating your frame rates based on in-game movements. During intense motion, Radeon Chill will run your FPS up to a defined FPS cap, while in instances where there’s no motion on the screen, the FPS will lower automatically to save power consumption. 
DirectX 12 Technology 
With Microsoft DirectX 12 (DX12), you get blazingly fast performance, high frames per second, and reduced latency on all AMD Radeon graphics cards. 
Multi Screen 
Equipped with one HDMI & DP ports, multi simultaneous display capable. Support HDMI 4K and 4K H264 Decode, 4K H264 Encode, H265/HEVC Decode, H265/HEVC Encode. 
The Vulkan API 
Vulkan supports close-to-metal control enabling faster performance and better image quality across Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11 and Linux. No other graphics API offers the same powerful combination of OS compatibility, rendering features, and hardware efficiency. 
High Performance Gaming at your Desk or on the Go & From Great to Greatness for Artfully Designed. Meticulously Crafted. Incredibly Intuitive.

AMD Radeon Chill 
Keep your system running cool and quiet by enabling Radeon Chill. This power saving feature helps save your battery by regulating your frame rates based on in-game movements. During intense motion, Radeon Chill will run your FPS up to a defined FPS cap, while in instances where there’s no motion on the screen, the FPS will lower automatically to save power consumption. 
DirectX 12 Technology 
With Microsoft DirectX 12 (DX12), you get blazingly fast performance, high frames per second, and reduced latency on all AMD Radeon graphics cards. 
Multi simultaneous display capable 
Equipped with one DVI, one dp & one HDMI ports, multi simultaneous display capable. Support HDMI 4K and 4K H264 Decode, 4K H264 Encode, H265/HEVC Decode, H265/HEVC Encode. 
The Vulkan API 
Vulkan supports close-to-metal control enabling faster performance and better image quality across Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11 and Linux. No other graphics API offers the same powerful combination of OS compatibility, rendering features, and hardware efficiency. 
High Performance Gaming at your Desk or on the Go & From Great to Greatness for Artfully Designed. Meticulously Crafted. Incredibly Intuitive.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
About Us 
GIGABYTE offers a comprehensive product lineup that aims to “Upgrade Your Life.” With expertise encompassing consumer, business, gaming, and cloud systems, GIGABYTE established its reputation as one of the leaders in the industry with products including motherboards, graphics cards, laptops, mini PCs, monitors, and other PC components and accessories. 
That which resonates with your life 
“Upgrade Your Life” is the core essence in everything we do at GIGABYTE. We break new ground. We also continuously provide reliable cloud infrastructure to help businesses optimize their operations as well as to advance development and expansion in the digital realm. By combining innovation and practicality, GIGABYTE wields the technology of the future to improve your life today. 
When ideas manifest into reality 
We have your bases covered, starting with the motherboard. With an established reputation for trusted quality, we pushed forward with graphics cards, laptops, and mini PCs, and corporations worldwide depend on us for reliable server solutions. Most of all, we have always been there innovating products that will spark your creativity. 
Foretelling your future in tech 
Visualize this: Tapping your phone connects you to cloud. Your city is on a 5G network integrating medical, transportation, and power services. Our vast product range can meet your personal, business, and computing needs and prepare you for future trends and developments. Using technology, we can achieve anything we visualize, and beyond.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
High Quality Japanese Dual Ball Bearings 
Dual ball bearings reduce rotational friction, providing excellent heat dissipation and effectively doubling the expected lifetime of the fans. 
Intelligent Fan Controller 
Utilizing temperature detection from a smart chip, fans will start running when the GPU reaches 60℃ and shut down below 50℃. Efficient cooling, fan-noise reduction, and extended product lifetime are all benefits of a more accurate temperature monitoring. 
Unprecedented Ring-fan Blade Design 
The newest 9-blade design of our fans generate better airflow and air pressure under the same noise level, improving cooling performance to reduce GPU temperatures by more than 3℃ compared to previous generations. 
GPU Direct-Contact Copper Plate 
We have increased the copper plate area to provide direct contact with the GPU while covering VRAM to increase the heat transfer threshold to the max. 
Vertical Fin Heatsink 
A brand new white heatsink with closely spaced vertical fins is mounted on the PCB, offering a larger heat-spreading area and improved heat radiation. This allows airflow to efficiently disperse heat. 
Turbulence Reducing Fan Rotation 
The middle fan spins in the reverse direction so as to reduce the air turbulence between neighboring fans when drawing in cool air. The mechanism therefore maximizes the air flow and pressure when less turbulence occurs to offset, further lowering noise level without sacrificing cooling efficiency. 
Car-Grade Power Module DrMOS with iMON Real Time Digital Monitoring 
Hellhound adopts a 10+3+1 phase VRM design with DrMOS to power the GPU as well as an additional 2+1 phase specifically designated for the VRAM. New IMON technology monitors and reports the electric current and power consumption on each individual phase. By balancing the workload, the Hellhound ensures unparalleled stability and thermal protection during overclocking. 
In addition, the high quality car-grade polymer capacitors feature long-lasting durability, and the high conductivity lowers power loss during transmission. 
High Quality PCB Design 
A premium 14-layer high TG PCB Board -including a 2 oz power layer- is utilized in the Hellhound RX 7900 XT; a PCB such designed decreases signal loss during transmission, which is important especially for higher-end GPUs with increased demands for higher currents and stability. 
Anti-Sag Bracket 
A robust metal bracket is installed on the side of the PCB and is supported all the way to the I/O plate, making the card stand firmly in place inside the chassis. 
Metal Reinforced Backplate 
The metal backplate strengthens and protects the internal components from PCB bend, and a cut-out design on the back plate allows exhaust heat to properly flow through for heat-dissipation efficiency. 
Ice Blue and Glacier White LED Color 
Hellhound of this generation now comes with two LED color options. Gamers are able to choose the color they want by flipping the switch on side of the card. 
Ice Blue shows the Hellhound's coolness, while Glacier White projects a crisp, calm elegance. 
Dual BIOS Mode 
Hellhound RX 7900 XT features Dual BIOS built-in and a switch for easy swapping. 
- OC BIOS: A boosted mode that increases fan RPM to keep your card operating at a lower temperature to drive higher performance. 
- Silent BIOS: Focused on lower noise and fan longevity, a milder fan speed, trading fan speed and noise for moderate, but still controlled, temperatures while maintaining performance.

title: EZDIY-FAB PSU Cable Extension Sleeved Custom Mod GPU PC Power Supply Soft Nylon Braided with Comb Kit 24PIN/8PIN to 6+2Pin/ 8PIN to 4+4PIN-30CM 300MM - Black
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Components › Internal Components › Internal Power Supplies
features: Our PSU cable extension kit uses 18AWG wire, meeting ATX3.0/3.1 specification standards. Low resistance and high efficiency, ideal for high-power GPUs and CPUs, it ensures stable power during peak performance.

Designing highly conductive terminals can significantly improve the stability and reliability of power transmission, making it ideal for users who seek the ultimate gaming experience and graphics processing performance.

Our cable extensions harmonize perfectly with PC components, offering a customized and tidy appearance. The kit includes cable combs for better organization and airflow. At 30 cm long and made from PET material, the cables are soft, flexible, and durable.
The package includes 2x 8-Pin to 6+2-Pin GPU power cables, suitable for both 6-Pin and 8-Pin GPU configurations, along with a 24-Pin motherboard power cable and a 4+4-Pin CPU power cable.
This 4-cable kit combines exceptional durability with stylish design, making it the perfect choice for mid-range PC builders who value both performance and appearance.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
High Quality Cable and Extremely Soft design 
The new individually sleeved cables are heat-shrink free to ensure high-quality cable assembly and support for high currents in order to achieve superior performance and stability. 
Premium fiber braided sleeve material made these wires rigid and yet flexible. 
Universal Connectors 
The Sleeved Extension Cable Kit uses universal ATX connectors, making the extension cables compatible with any standard ATX power supply unit cables currently on the market. Whether you have any brand's PSUs, you can still use these extension cables with your current or future system. Don't let brand names stop you from having your system look the way you want it to. 
30CM CABLE LENGTH 
These cable extensions are 30cm in length to give you enough slack to deal with a large amount of additional clutter behind your motherboard plate. For most standard ATX cases, these cable extensions will allow you a comfortable amount of sleeved cabling so you can have the professional looking build you’ve always wanted. 
UL 18 AWG Wire Core 
Utilize UL-certified cables, designed to meet high specifications and manage high-output power supplies. Ideal for most power supply units. 
Package contents 
- 1 x 24-Pin ATX motherboard cable extension (30cm) 
- 1 x 4+4 Pin EPS CPU cable extension (30cm) 
- 2 x 6+2 Pin PCI-e GPU cable extension (30cm) 
- 4 x 24-Pin cable combs 
- 12 x 8-Pin cable combs

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
“The wallpaper software recommends using "Wallpaper Engine", 
Hardware monitoring software is recommended to use "AIDA64 Extreme". 
(The software needs to be purchased by the user) 
The 1280x800 resolution / 8-inch screen is about 188ppi, which exceeds the display accuracy of a 27-inch 4K monitor of about 162ppi. According to the actual use of 50cm~70cm visual distance, will not produce a sense of pixel particles, all kinds of wallpaper dynamic effects can jump on the screen. 
It can be completely disassembled and placed on the desktop 
Cooperate with the main display in multitasking operating 
Short vertical air duct is constructed for heat dissipation 
The heat flow in the space will rise naturally. The D31 follows this characteristic to build the air duct: it supports up to 8 or 12CM fans (or 4 14CM+2 12CM fans). 
Thanks to the relatively low box height, the vertical air flow from bottom to top quickly covers the heating hardware, and the internal accumulated heat is discharged from the top mesh. In addition, the installation direction of the power supply can be bidirectional: the power supply air inlet can face the panel direction, without interfering with the internal air duct under the air cooling radiator environment. 
The GPU calculation length includes the total length of the pci-e block 
The length of the GPU is affected by the orientation of the power supply 
When three 12cm fans are installed on the top, the power supply can be installed in the second hanging position 
If 360AIO is installed on the top, it is recommended to install the power supply with a length of 14cm to obtain a longer GPU installation control 
When the length of the GPU supply is <330mm, the power supply can be installed in the fourth hanging position. 
Fan support： 
Top：120mm*3 or 140mm*2( Optional)

modules.title: Short vertical air duct is constructed for heat dissipation
modules.text:
The heat flow in the space will rise naturally. The D31 follows this characteristic to build the air duct: it supports up to 8 or 12CM fans (or 4 14CM+2 12CM fans). 
Thanks to the relatively low box height, the vertical air flow from bottom to top quickly covers the heating hardware, and the internal accumulated heat is discharged from the top mesh. In addition, the installation direction of the power supply can be bidirectional: the power supply air inlet can face the panel direction, without interfering with the internal air duct under the air cooling radiator environment.

items.text:
The GPU calculation length includes the total length of the pci-e block 
The length of the GPU is affected by the orientation of the power supply
When three 12cm fans are installed on the top, the power supply can be installed in the second hanging position
If 360AIO is installed on the top, it is recommended to install the power supply with a length of 14cm to obtain a longer GPU installation control
When the length of the GPU supply is <330mm, the power supply can be installed in the fourth hanging position.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Features 
ThermalSync 
By the patented(pending) heatsink design and an extra thermal sensor, SPARKLE Intel Arc TITAN / ORC series is able to change the color of LED lightbar according to GPU temperature without installing any driver. 
TORN Cooling 
The TORN cooling solution features a customized AXL Fan, which delivers superior airflow for optimal cooling. The fan blades are designed with stripe structures and polished surfaces on the bottom side, enhancing their cooling performance even further. 
0dB Fan Mode 
0dB fan mode allows fans stop spinning when GPU temperature lower than target, provide ultra silence experience when your system in a light loading. 
AV1 Encoder 
The world’s first VGA support AV1 encode delivered the powerful media acceleration with DP2.0 x3 and HDMI 2.0 x1 support the new generation of 8K video output, providing an ultimate creation experience. 
Support for Every Major Codec 
H.264/AVC
VP9
H.265/HEVC
AV1
Intel Arc A750 
Let's Play 
Unlock your next gaming adventure with Intel Arc graphics, powered by all-new XeHPG microarchitecture, delivering scalable performance.
With a wide range of hardware and software optimizations, from advanced Xe-cores, to AI-enhanced XeSS upscaling technology, to robust Game On drivers, jump into a new world of gaming with Intel Arc graphics.
Full support for DirectX 12 Ultimate enables exceptional visual experiences in vivid virtual worlds.
Xe HPG microarchitecture features advanced ray tracing units to elevate gaming experiences with realistic lighting, shadows, and reflections.
Let’s Create 
Unleash your imagination and captivate audiences with rich digital content creation using a hyper advanced media engine, augmented by AI and accelerated by Intel Deep Link technology.
Create compelling content, powered by a graphics card with support for all current leading media formats, and get equipped for the future with AV1 video encode capabilities.
Whether you edit photos and videos or create in 3D, Intel Arc graphics is the ultimate choice in performance for digital creation.
Let’s Stream 
Broadcast and stream from any space with advanced streaming technologies enabling flexibility and creative control.
Intel Arc graphics delivers a fully featured streaming experience with performance accelerating Intel Deep Link technology, enhanced stream quality, a convenient virtual camera, and automatically generated highlights.
A high performance, seamless end-to end streaming experience is just one click away.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer

ASUS is one of Fortune magazine’s World’s Most Admired Companies and is one of the top motherboard and gaming brands as well as a top-three consumer notebook vendor. ASUS is driven by passion and innovation and dedicated to creating quality products for a future smart life, designing and manufacturing products that perfectly meet the needs of today's digital home, office and person. Our wide portfolio includes MG248Q, Chromebox and a range of devices and components, along with AR and VR. 
TUF-RX7900XTX-O24G-GAMING 
ASUS TUF Gaming Radeon RX 7900 XTX OC Edition 24GB GDDR6 Graphics Card (PCIe 4.0, 24GB GDDR6, HDMI 2.1a, DisplayPort 2.1) 
Axial-tech fans scaled up to deliver 14% more airflow. 
Dual ball fan bearings last up to twice as long as conventional designs. 
Military-grade capacitors rated for 20K hours at 105C make the GPU power rail more durable. 
Metal Exoskeleton adds structural rigidity and vents to increase heat dissipation. 
Auto-Extreme precision automated manufacturing for higher reliability. 
GPU Tweak III software provides intuitive performance tweaking, thermal controls, and system monitoring. 
AXIAL-TECH UPGRADES 
Air Superiority. 
Bigger and better. Axial-tech fans spin on dual-ball bearings and have been scaled up to propel 14% more air through the card, setting the stage for lower temperatures, less noise, and higher performance. 
NEW DIRECTION 
Well-maintained Formation. 
The two side fans spin counterclockwise to minimize turbulence and maximize air dispersion through the heatsink. All three fans come to a standstill when GPU temps are below 55 Celsius, letting you play less-demanding games or perform light tasks in relative silence. Fans start up again when temps are over 60 Celsius, referencing a speed curve that balances performance and acoustics for work or play. 
3.63-SLOT DESIGN 
Phase That Blaze. 
A generously sized heatsink efficiently soaks up heat from the AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX GPU, allowing it to be whisked away by the three Axial-tech fans. 
MILITARY-GRADE 20K CAPACITORS 
Resilient Squadron. 
A lineup of capacitors rated to last 20,000 hours at 105 Celsius brings higher temperature and ripple tolerance to the GPU power rail, arming the card for long-term deployment in challenging conditions. 
METAL EXOSKELETON 
Suit Up. 
A diecast frame, aluminum shroud, and backplate prevent PCB flex and feature large vents to further increase heat dissipation. 
AUTO-EXTREME TECHNOLOGY 
Reliability Boost. 
Auto-Extreme Technology is an automated manufacturing process that sets new standards in the industry by allowing all soldering to be completed in a single pass. This reduces thermal strain on components and avoids the use of harsh cleaning chemicals, resulting in less environmental impact, lower manufacturing power consumption, and a more reliable product overall. 
AURA SYNC 
Light ‘em Up! 
Aura-compatible ARGB lighting on the shroud adds a dash of customizable color or functional effects to your build. Pair up with a vast range of compatible system components and coordinate the glow to create a theme that’s uniquely you. 
GRAPHICS CARD HOLDER 
Pillar of Support. 
The bundled graphics card holder banishes sag and also contains a screwdriver to help you build.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer

ASUS is one of Fortune magazine’s World’s Most Admired Companies and is one of the top motherboard and gaming brands as well as a top-three consumer notebook vendor. ASUS is driven by passion and innovation and dedicated to creating quality products for a future smart life, designing and manufacturing products that perfectly meet the needs of today's digital home, office and person. Our wide portfolio includes MG248Q, Chromebox and a range of devices and components, along with AR and VR. 
ProArt GeForce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER 16GB GDDR6X OC Edition 
ProArt GeForce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER OC Edition 16GB GDDR6X brings elegant and minimalist style to empower creator PC builds with full-scale GeForce RTX 40 SUPER Series performance. 
NVIDIA Studio: RTX and AI-accelerated creator apps, exclusive AI software, and Studio Drivers for unmatched creativity and performance 
NVIDIA Ada Lovelace Streaming Multiprocessors: Up to 2x performance and power efficiency 
4th Generation Tensor Cores: Up to 4x performance with DLSS 3 vs. brute-force rendering 
3rd Generation RT Cores: Up to 2x ray tracing performance 
3rd Generation RT Cores: Up to 2x ray tracing performance 
2.5-slot design: allows for greater build compatibility while maintaining premium cooling 
2.5-slot design: allows for greater build compatibility while maintaining premium cooling 
Dual Ball Fan Bearings last up to twice as long as conventional designs 
Axial-tech Upgrades 
A Fresh Spin 
Bigger and better. Axial-tech fans spin on dual-ball bearings and have been scaled up to propel 21% more air through the card, setting the stage for lower temperatures, less noise, and higher performance. 
Reverse Rotation and 0dB Technology 
Orchestrated Chill 
The two side fans spin counterclockwise to minimize turbulence and maximize air dispersion through the heatsink. All three fans come to a standstill when GPU temps are below 50 Celsius, letting you play less-demanding games or perform light tasks in relative silence. Fans start up again when temps are over 55°C, referencing a speed curve that balances performance and acoustics for work or play. 
2.5-slot Design 
Custom Heatsink 
Heatpipes efficiently wick heat into a fin stack optimized for airflow from the Axial-tech fans. The entire array is dressed in stealthy black to match the ProArt theme. 
Premium Power Delivery 
1st Responder 
Digital power control, an array of high-current power stages, and a lineup of 15K caps ensure massive reserves to reliably push performance boundaries. 
Compact PCB 
Packs a Punch 
Component and trace layouts have been optimized onto a short PCB to reduce power losses and let heat escape through a massive backplate vent. 
Auto−Extreme Technology 
Reliability Boost 
Auto-Extreme Technology is an automated manufacturing process that sets new standards in the industry by allowing all soldering to be completed in a single pass. This reduces thermal strain on components and avoids the use of harsh cleaning chemicals, resulting in less environmental impact, lower manufacturing power consumption, and a more reliable product overall. 
Graphics Card Holder 
Pillar of Support 
The bundled graphics card holder banishes sag and also contains a screwdriver to help you build. 
Software Suite 
Harness the hardware 
Hardware and software come together to let you fully customize your experience and get the most out of your graphics card. GPU Tweak III allows for hardware tweaking and monitoring, and QuantumCloud utilizes your spare GPU computing power to generate passive income.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
SRhonyra 4HDMI Multiple Monitors Graphics Card Geforce GT 730 2GB DDR3 Video Card 
Dual-slot width 
This 4×HDMI dual outputs graphics card comes with a full-height bracket, fits your multiple screens projects well. 
4-monitor graphics card 
Support for up to 4 Displays: HDMI 1080P resolutions 1920x1080 @60Hz (Single screen) / 3840x2160 @60Hz(Splicing screens) 
Energy Efficient 
This mutli-screen video card total requires only 25 watts of power from the PCIe 2.0 x16 bus. Recommended 350 watts or greater power supply. 
2 Audio Outputs 
This discrete HDMI outputs graphcis card support 2 channel audio out via cable. Please change the setting for the playback device enable HDMI audio output. 
How multiple monitors system can benefit your business 
In a digital-first world, everything lives on the screen. It is hard to try to jump between windows to get work done efficiently.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
VisionTek Radeon HD 5450 1GB GDDR3 2M – 1x HDMI, 1x DVI-I, 1x VGA – 900860 
Legacy Graphics 
The VisionTek AMD Radeon HD 5450 graphics card series is ideal for users looking to add video output to a legacy system. Ideal for low power dual display expansion. 
Single Slot 
The HD 5450 fits a full height or SFF system, taking up only 1 PCIe slot. SFF supports HDMI and DVI-I in single slot, + VGA in dual slot. 
Multi-Monitor Graphics 
Supports up to 2 displays at resolutions up to 1920 x 1080. HDMI, DVI-I, and VGA supported. 
Energy Efficient 
The HD 5450 requires only 19 watts of power from the PCIe Bus. Recommended 250 watt or greater power supply. 
Silent Legacy Expansion 
Utilizing a passive heatsink instead of noisy fans, the Radeon HD 5450 ensures silent operation, allowing you to immerse yourself in your tasks without any distracting background noise. 
Productivity 
Expand your desktop with multiple displays allowing for better efficiency and improved multitasking capabilities. Have web browser windows, spreadsheets and email up and accessible at the same time.

【5V ARGB SyncGraphic card Support】This gpu holder is equipped with addressable ARGB LED lights argb strip to make your computer case colorful and bring you the ultimate visual experience.

【Easy Installation ARGB gpu sag bracket】 The rgb gpu sag bracket compatible with a variety of motherboards and cases, provides two-way sliding adjustment for different lengths of graphics cards and support positions to adjust to the right position.
【Before purchasing】Please make sure your PC Case have enough space and reserved screw holes to install the graphics card bracket. The installation height of the GPU stand holder is 50mm.

Pefect hold

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Double Ball Bearing Fans - Quieter & Longer Lifespan 
The Magnetic Air system utilizes a double ball bearing structure, which provides better endurance and efficiency than other designs. Double ball bearings reduce friction and heat while operating quieter and have an increased lifespan. 
XFX Dual BIOS Ready 
We know enthusiasts like options, so for the XFX Magnetic Air 7800 XT graphics cards, we are offering dual BIOS. Giving a backup BIOS in the case of a failed BIOS update or flash. 
AMD Radiance Display Engine 
The AMD Radiance Display Engine features 12-bit HDR and full coverage of the REC2020 color space for incredible color accuracy. With support for DisplayPort 2.1, experience breathtaking visuals with up to 68 Billion colors at up to 8K 165Hz. • DisplayPort 2.1 • 12-Bit HDR up to 68 billion Colors 
World’s First Chiplet Designed Gaming GPUs 
Featuring ultra-fast 2nd generation AMD Infinity Cache technology connected through an ultra-high bandwidth chiplet interconnect. • 5.3 TB/s Chiplet Interconnect Bandwidth • 58 billion Transistors

description: Leveraging the premium Air-Optimized design, the ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX 4070 AMP AIRO utilizes the state-of-the-art NVIDIA Ada Lovelace architecture to give gamers cutting-edge features such as DLSS 3 and real time raytracing. Using cutting-edge cooling technologies derived from the flagship model, AMP AIRO features a premium AIR Optimized design and aesthetic with enhanced noise mitigation, robust durability, and packs the punch needed to deliver blistering FPS in the latest titles. This Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse inspired bundle includes a number of themed goodies, such as a themed magnetic backplate and custom fan emblems to make the AMP AIRO extra stylish, as well as a random themed figurine from a selection of 3 styles, a tote bag and more that fans are sure to love. inStockText: In Stock  In Stock

features: 【2GB DDR3 Memory】The GeForce GT 710 was a graphics card by NVIDIA,built on the 28 nm process, and based on the GK208 graphics processor,the GPU is operating at a frequency of 954 MHz, memory is running at 1800MHz,perfect for working,video and photo editing,allows good fluency,which can effectively meet your needs.

【Low Profile Design】This low profile graphics card with single cooling fan is perfect for slim or full sized systems(with low profile bracket),easy to Install,plug and play,single-slot design, compatible with HTPC platform,easily upgrading for convenient usage to save your budget for your old pc.
【Multiple Interfaces】Supports up to 2 monitors simultaneously. Display outputs include: 1x HDMI, 1x VGA. GeForce GT 710 is connected to the rest of the system using a PCI-Express 2.0 x8 interface.

【Independently Powered】The video card does not require any additional power connector, its power draw is rated at 19W maximum through the motherboard PCIe x 8 lane,and 300W or greater power supply is recommended.Works with Windows 10 as well as 7, 8 and 8.1(NOT compatible with windows 11).

【Good Choice】This budget computer graphics card is good value option, if you just want basic upgrade graphics and daily simple work for your computer, or not be AAA gamer. If there is any help needed during your installation or usage of the Graphics Card, welcome to contact us.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
SRhonyra 4HDMI Multiple Monitors Graphics Card Geforce GTX 750Ti 4GB GDDR5 Video Card 
Dual-slot width 
This 4×HDMI dual outputs graphics card comes with a full-height bracket, fits your multiple screens projects well. 
4-monitor graphics card 
Support for up to 4 Displays: HDMI 4K resolutions 3840×2160 @60Hz(singel screen) ; 7680x4320 @60Hz (Splicing screens) 
Energy Efficient 
This mutli-screen video card total requires only 65 watts of power from the PCIe 3.0 x16 bus. Recommended 400 watts or greater power supply. 
4 Audio Outputs 
This discrete HDMI outputs graphcis card support 4 channel audio out via cable. Please change the setting for the playback device enable HDMI audio output. 
How multiple monitors system can benefit your business 
In a digital-first world, everything lives on the screen. It is hard to try to jump between windows to get work done efficiently. 
For a personal user, the multiple monitors setup will boost your productivity, saving your time and energe, as you will have plenty of screen real estate, no need to reduce the window sizes to show more on the single screen, no more often tabbing back and forth between windows. 
For enterprised users, the system will ensure your business stands out from the crowd. Featuring editable display, you could use it to show your latest products and services and inform potential buyers about the inventory available. 
Connect up to 2 displays with support for resolutions up to 4K resolution, you could not only use it for a video wall, restaurant signage, but also a home theater setups, and welcome monitors.

• SRhonyra 4HDMI multiple monitors graphics card 
• User manual 
OS Support:

• Windows 8 - 32/64 bit 
• Windows 7 - 32/64 bit

title: VisionTek Radeon RX 550 4GB GDDR5 4K Monitor Graphics Card, 4x DisplayPort Outputs, PCI Express 3.0, DirectX 12, Bus-Powered - 901458
inStockText: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.  Only 3 left in stock - order soon.

description: NEXT GENERATION GRAPHICSAMD Radeon RDNA architecture is engineered for the next generation of high-performance gaming. It's the DNA that powers your games, the DNA that brings your games to life, the DNA that keeps evolving.Take your gaming experience to the next level, experience stutter-free, tear-free gaming, reduced input latency and optimized drivers for new game releases with the AMD Radeon Software Adrenalin 2020 Edition.FidelityFX is a collection of high-quality post-process effects that automatically collapse multiple effects into fewer shader passes to reduce overhead and free up your GPU for the visceral experience you demand. Radeon Image Sharpening combines contrasts-adaptive sharpening with GPU upscaling to delivery crisp looking visuals with virtually no performance impact.
features: 4x 4K @ 60Hz DISPLAYS – Connect up to 4x 4K displays via DisplayPort 1.4. The outputs can power all displays to 4K @ 60Hz simultaneously with support for features such as Radeon FreeSync 2
PCIe BUS-POWERED – Powered entirely by the PCIe 3.0 bus, this graphics card will not require any additional power connectors. (Note: a minimum of 350W or greater system power supply is recommended)

RADEON FREESYNC 2 – FreeSync 2 allows your displays to vary their refresh rate in order to match the framerate of your AMD Graphics Card. FreeSync 2 also supports high dynamic range (HDR), low framerate compensation, and low latency. (Note: must use Radeon FreeSync compatible displays to utilize features)
4GB GDDR5 MEMORY – 1500MHz memory clock and 1071Mhz core clock speeds with 128-bit memory bus
3 Year Limited Warranty - VisionTek is pleased to offer 3 year limited warranty when product is registered within 30 days of purchase

VisionTek Radeon RX 550 4M - 4x DP, 4GB GDDR5 - 901458 
Elevate Your System 
The VisionTek AMD Radeon RX 550 4M graphics card series is ideal for users looking to increase productivity by supporting up to four displays. Showcase your company with a multi-display video wall, install welcome monitors in separate rooms, improve workspace productivity or simply upgrade your monitor setup. VisonTek’s RX 550 4M graphics cards are the ideal low power multi-monitor solution. 
Single Slot

Multi-Monitor Graphics 
Support for up to 4 DisplayPort Displays at resolutions up to 4k. 
Energy Efficient 
The RX 550 4M requires only 50 watts of power from the PCIe Bus. Recommended 350 watt or greater power supply. 
Expand Your Vision 
Transform your computer from a standard desktop into a expanded workstation with VisionTek Multi-Monitor Graphics Cards. Connect up to 4 displays with support for resolutions up to 4K. Showcase your company with a multi-display video wall, install welcome monitors, restaurant signage, trade show displays, home theater setups, stock trading workstation or expand your home office monitor setup.

From the manufacturer

ASUS is one of Fortune magazine’s World’s Most Admired Companies and is one of the top motherboard and gaming brands as well as a top-three consumer notebook vendor. ASUS is driven by passion and innovation and dedicated to creating quality products for a future smart life, designing and manufacturing products that perfectly meet the needs of today's digital home, office and person. Our wide portfolio includes MG248Q, Chromebox and a range of devices and components, along with AR and VR. 
ASUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER BTF White OC Edition 16GB GDDR6X 
ASUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER BTF White OC Edition 16GB GDDR6X with DLSS3, innovative Graphics Card High-Power (GC-HPWR) Gold Finger, and enhanced durability. 
Powered by NVIDIA DLSS3, ultra-efficient Ada Lovelace arch, and full ray tracing 
4th Generation Tensor Cores: Up to 4x performance with DLSS 3 vs. brute-force rendering 
3rd Generation RT Cores: Up to 2x ray tracing performance 
OC edition: Boost Clock 2670 MHz (OC Mode)/ 2640 MHz (Default Mode) 
Graphics card high-power gold finger for power transmission, and prevent GPU sag 
Eliminate the need for traditional 16-pin external power connections to the graphics card 
Axial-tech fans scaled up for 21% more airflow 
Dual ball fan bearings last up to twice as long as conventional designs 
AXIAL-TECH UPGRADES 
Air Superiority 
Bigger and better. Axial-tech fans spin on dual-ball bearings and have been scaled up to propel 21% more air through the card, setting the stage for lower temperatures, less noise, and higher performance. 
NEW DIRECTION 
Well-maintained Formation 
The two side fans spin counterclockwise to minimize turbulence and maximize air dispersion through the heatsink. All three fans come to a standstill when GPU temps are below 50 Celsius, letting you play less-demanding games or perform light tasks in relative silence. Fans start up again when temps are over 55 Celsius, referencing a speed curve that balances performance and acoustics for work or play. 
3.25-SLOT DESIGN 
Phase That Blaze 
A generously oversized heatsink combo efficiently soak up heat from the GeForce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER BTF White Edition GPU so that it can be whisked away by the three Axial-tech fans. 
MILITARY-GRADE 20K CAPACITORS 
Resilient Squadron 
A lineup of capacitors rated to last 20,000 hours at 105 Celsius brings higher temperature and ripple tolerance to the GPU power rail, arming the card for long-term deployment in challenging conditions. 
COMPACT PCB 
Component and trace layouts have been optimized onto a short PCB to reduce power losses and let heat escape through a massive backplate vent. 
METAL EXOSKELETON 
A high-quality diecast shroud and aluminum backplate prevent PCB flex and feature large vents to further increase heat dissipation. 
Graphics Card High-Power (GC-HPWR) Gold Finger 
The graphics card high-power (GC-HPWR) gold finger is capable to deliver up to 600W through the “graphics card high-power slot” on BTF motherboards, eliminating visible external power connectors for a cleaner build. This design also adds structural support, preventing graphics card sag and ensuring a sleek setup. 
Auto-Extreme Technology 
Auto-Extreme Technology is an automated manufacturing process that sets new standards in the industry by allowing all soldering to be completed in a single pass. This reduces thermal strain on components and avoids the use of harsh cleaning chemicals, resulting in less environmental impact, lower manufacturing power consumption, and a more reliable product overall. 
AURA SYNC 
Aura-compatible ARGB lighting on the shroud adds a dash of customizable color or functional effects to your build. Pair up with a vast range of compatible system components and coordinate the glow to create a theme that’s uniquely you.

Short/Small Form Factor (SFF) design fits in today’s Low-Profile desktops and workstations via the short bracket mounted on card. This LP card can fir easily fit in almost all mini-ITX cases.

Less Power Consuming: Because of their small size and lesser components, low-profile graphics cards consume less power than regular-sized graphics cards. The 51Risc RX550 low-profile graphics card does not need an external power connector from the PSU, and it works only on the power supplied by the PCI Express x16 slot. Also, you do not need a high Wattage power supply for them, as a budget PSU of 300W is enough for them, given that it is an average PC build.
Less Noisy: This low-profile graphics card is generally less noisy, because it comes with a single cooling fan, and uses a heatsink for cooling. it is almost silent in operation.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Introduce 
As a new brand,QTHREE is dedicated to consumer and business-grade electronics manufacturing.QTHREE is proud to have products assembled for customers. 
The Radeon RX 550 was an entry-level graphics card by AMD.Built on the 14 nm process, and based on the Lexa graphics processor, in its Lexa PRO variant, the card supports DirectX 12.This ensures that all modern games will run on Radeon RX 550. 
Radeon RX 550 Graphics Card,4GB,GDDR5,128-Bit, low Profile,VGA DVI-D HDMI,ITX Design,PC Video Card Gaming 
Features 4GB of GDDR5 memory, boost clock up to 1180 MHz
512 stream processor high-specification chips, even compatible with ITX chassis
VGA/HDMI/DVI-D three interfaces, supports Blu-ray HD, 4K@60Hz output
It is an ideal platform for building a Home Theater PC (HTPC), including support for HDMI 4K60, 4K video playback, HEVC content, HDR, FreeSync 2, and more.
As well as GPU acceleration of some application software, such as Photoshop, Premier and so on.
Attentions:If it's no video signal when plugged in the gpu into the PCIe slot, and not sure if pc is compatible, please try to update the drivers via AMD website. 
Polaris Architecture 
Polaris architecture precisely combines the latest 14nm FinFET process with AMD's advanced power management, gating and clocking technologies for a super cool, quiet gaming experience. 
Silent Cooling Fan 
Equipped with independent cooling fan,which keep the GPU cooler and running stronger to keep lower working temperature and higher efficiency, it also can drives 4k monitor, making your daily work smooth and fast. 
Multiple Interfaces 
Equipped with DVI, VGA and HDMI ports,supports up to 3 monitors simultaneous.Support Blu-ray HD, 60Hz output 4K resolution.Light gaming is probably ok,it's just great to show a lot of working windows.

The Radeon RX 550 is capable of handling most everyday applications, including browsing the web, editing photo videos, watching HD and 4K videos, and even playing some games at 1080P. Also runs some common software, such as Adobe's Photoshop and Premiere.

Make It Yours 
We're all about the things that make building a PC such a rewarding experience. The sense of achievement. The joy of making and creating something uniquely yours in form and function and, of course, the thrill of bringing your creation to life without melting your components. 
Universal Vertical Graphics Card Holder Kit V3

Supporting cases ranging in size from mATX to ATX, this remastered design allows unprecedented compatibility with various builds and setups. aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Glorto GeForce GT 610 2G graphics card, a powerful and affordable solution for improving your old computer experience. Designed with NVIDIA's upgraded generation of GPU technology, the GT 610 delivers high-performance graphics processing capabilities while maintaining optimal energy efficiency. 
With a memory capacity of 2GB, the GT 610 can handle even the most graphically demanding applications and games with ease. Its fast memory speed ensures smooth animations and seamless gameplay, while the large memory capacity allows for better multitasking and improved overall system performance. 
The GT 610 is optimized for maximum compatibility with many kinds of operating systems(include Win11), ensuring smooth integration into your existing system. It supports DirectX 11 for advanced graphics rendering and comes with Nvidia's official drivers for stable performance and enhanced features. 
The card's low profile design makes it ideal for small form factor systems or any other space-conscious build, while its cooling system ensures quiet operation and increased reliability. 
Whether you're a casual gamer, a graphics professional, or someone looking to enhance the overall performance of their old PC, the GT 610 2G graphics card offers a perfect balance of performance and affordability. 
NVIDIA GeForce GT 610 2GB DDR3 64 Bit PCI Express 1.1 x 16 Low Profile Video Card 
Low noise and silent work, lower temperature and higher efficiency 
With 2048MB of memory capacity, this graphics card can meet the demands of home entertainment, light gaming, and office tasks. 
Offers VGA and HDMI interfaces, making the video card easy to connect different types of displays. The VGA interface is suitable for analog signals and the HDMI interface supports high-definition video transmission.
Features a half-height low-profile design that making it compatible with various computer cases, especially SFF tower match with the included brackets.
What You Will Get: 
Glorto GeForce GT 610 2GB Graphics Card x1 
Low Profile Bracket x1 
Perfectly Compatible with All Kinds of Windows Systems include Win11 
No need to manually download and install the Win11 driver, just install the graphics card, turn on the computer and wait for about 7 minutes. Microsoft will automatically install the Win11 driver for your computer (please make sure that your computer does not have any graphics card driver before), then right-click on the computer desktop to open the NVIDIA control panel. 
What Glorto GeForce GT 610 Can Do: 
Dual Screen Display 
Picture & Video Editing 
Office Working 
Specification 
GPU Name 	GF119 	
Memory Format 	2GB DDR3 64 bits 	
Ports 	HDMI / VGA 	
CUDA Core 	48 	
GPU Clock 	523 MHz 	
Memory Clock 	500 MHz 	
Shader Clock 	1046 MHz 	
Slot 	PCI Express x16 1.1 	
DirectX Support 	DirectX 11.0 	
Maximum Digital Resolution 	2560x1600 	
Computing 	OpenCL / CUDA / DirectCompute 5.0 	
Technologies 	OpenGL 	
Troubleshooting Tips 
The following troubleshooting tips may help if you experience problems. Contact GLORTO for more advanced troubleshooting information. 
Check that the card is seated properly in the PCI Express slot.
Ensure that the display cable is securely fastened to the card's display connector.
Make sure that the monitor and computer are plugged in and receiving power.
If necessary, disable any built-in graphics capabilities on your motherboard. For more information, consult your computer's manual or manufacturer. (NOTE: Some manufacturers do not allow the built-in graphics to be disabled or to become the secondary display.)
Make sure you selected the appropriate display device and graphics card when you install the graphics driver.
Restart your computer. Press on your keyboard after system starts up. When the Windows Advanced Options Menu appears, select Safe Mode and press . After getting into Safe Mode, in Device Manager check whether the driver for the graphics card is correct.
If you are not able to find the desired monitor color/resolution settings: The color and screen resolution options available for selection depend on the graphics card being installed. If necessary, adjust your monitor's setting using monitor's adjust panel to make the screen look focused, crisp, and sharp. (Please refer to the monitor's manual.)

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Features 
Angular Velocity Fan Blade 
The Angular Velocity Fan Blade provides a double layer of downward air pressure which alongside the air pressure on the outer ring of the Axial fan, results in up to 44% more downward air pressure and up to 19% more airflow for a quieter and cooler operation when compared to the previous generations. 
AMD RDNA 3 Architecture with Hardware Raytracing 
The AMD RDNA 3 architecture features industry-advancing chiplet technology to deliver next-generation performance, visuals, and power efficiency. Discover new levels of performance with advanced AMD RDNA 3 compute units, featuring redesigned raytracing accelerators for incredible performance while improving image quality. 
Intelligent Fan Control 
Fan speed is intelligently controlled to keep the GPU, memory, PWM IC and other components as low as possible in temperature to balance performance, and fan noise.

description: The next generation is finally here. The ROG Strix GeForce RTX™ 4090 has been reimagined and improved to house the all new Ada Lovelace architecture from NVIDIA, which delivers up to 2x the performance of the previous generation and brings new and improved NVIDIA technologies to the market.
features: NVIDIA Ada Lovelace Streaming Multiprocessors: Up to 2x performance and power efficiency
4th Generation Tensor Cores: Up to 2X AI performance
3rd Generation RT Cores: Up to 2X ray tracing performance
Axial-tech fans scaled up for 23% more airflow
New patented vapor chamber with milled heatspreader for lower GPU temps

3.5-slot design: massive fin array optimized for airflow from the three Axial-tech fans, Diecast shroud, frame, and backplate add rigidity and are vented to further maximize airflow and heat dissipation.
Digital power control with high-current power stages and 15K capacitors to fuel maximum performance.
GPU Tweak III software provides intuitive performance tweaking, thermal controls, and system monitoring

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer

Republic of Gamers (ROG), part of the ASUS family, is dedicated to creating innovative hardcore gaming hardware for gamers. ROG is committed to providing the absolute best performance and quality from its complete line of products. ROG is for those keen on the finest gaming hardware and software as it enables the ultimate computing experience for gamers and enthusiasts worldwide. It incorporates a stylish gamer-focused design, merging the excitement of gaming with a unique premium style. 
ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4090 24GB GDDR6X White Edition 
ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4090 24GB GDDR6X White Edition with DLSS 3 and chart-topping thermal performance 
AI Performance: 1321 AI TOPS 
NVIDIA Ada Lovelace Streaming Multiprocessors: Up to 2x performance and power efficiency 
4th Generation Tensor Cores: Up to 4x performance with DLSS 3 vs. brute-force rendering 
3rd Generation RT Cores: Up to 2X ray tracing performance 
Axial-tech fans scaled up for 23% more airflow 
New patented vapor chamber with milled heatspreader for lower GPU temps 
3.5-slot design: massive fin array optimized for airflow from the three Axial-tech fans 
Diecast shroud, frame, and backplate add rigidity and are vented to further maximize airflow and heat dissipation 
Axial-tech Upgrades 
A Fresh Spin 
Bigger and better. Axial-tech fans spin on dual-ball bearings and have been scaled up to propel 23% more air through the card, setting the stage for lower temperatures, less noise, and higher performance. 
Reverse Rotation and 0dB Technology 
Orchestrated Chill 
The two side fans spin counterclockwise to minimize turbulence and maximize air dispersion through the heatsink. All three fans come to a standstill when GPU temps are below 50 Celsius, letting you play less-demanding games or perform light tasks in relative silence. Fans start up again when temps are over 55 C, referencing a speed curve that balances performance and acoustics for work or play. 
3.5-slot Design 
Through Thick and Fin 
The custom sink is generously sized and structured to soak up heat from the GeForce RTX 4090 GPU so that it can be efficiently whisked away by the three Axial-tech fans. 
Compact PCB 
Packs a Punch 
Component and trace layouts have been optimized onto a short PCB to reduce power losses and let heat escape through a massive backplate vent. 
Power Sensing 
Quick Diagnosis 
Know if your PSU is worthy. ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4090 graphics cards feature a high-speed circuit that constantly monitors input power from the PSU and utilizes conveniently placed LEDs to indicate voltage regulation issues and cable connection problems. 
Frames Win Games 
Competitive games like Apex Legends demand maximum frame rates and the lowest system latency. Get the competitive edge you need at sub-25 milliseconds (ms) with NVIDIA Reflex and 144+ frames per second (FPS) powered by GeForce RTX. Best responsiveness. Unbeatable performance. Frames Win Games.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Ray Tracing 
The Ada architecture unleashes the full glory of ray tracing, which simulates how light behaves in the real world. With the power of RTX 40 Series and third-gen RT Cores, you can experience incredibly detailed virtual worlds like never before. 
NVIDIA DLSS 3 
DLSS is a revolutionary breakthrough in AI graphics that multiplies performance. Powered by the new fourth-gen Tensor Cores and Optical Flow Accelerator on GeForce RTX 40 Series GPUs, DLSS 3 uses AI to create additional frames and improve image quality. 
NVIDIA Reflex 
NVIDIA Reflex and GeForce RTX 40 Series GPUs deliver the lowest latency and best responsiveness for the ultimate competitive advantage. Built to optimize and measure system latency, Reflex provides faster target acquisition, quicker reaction times, and the best aim precision for competitive games. 
TRI FROZR 3 THERMAL DESIGN 
Stay cool and quiet. MSI’s TRI FROZR 3 thermal design enhances heat dissipation all around the graphics card. 
TORX FAN 5.0 
Fan blades linked by ring arcs and a fan cowl work together to stabilize and maintain high-pressure airflow. 
COPPER BASEPLATE FACING THE HEAT HEAD-ON 
The heat from the GPU and memory modules is captured by a copper baseplate and then rapidly transferred to Core Pipes. 
KEEPING THE CORE COOL 
Core Pipes are precision-crafted to make maximum use of the available space. A squared section of heat pipes fully touches the GPU baseplate to then spread heat along the full length of the heatsink. 
AIRFLOW CONTROL 
Airflow Control improves airflow dynamics through Wave Curved 2.0 and updated deflectors for optimizing the balance between cooling and quieter acoustics. 
UNRESTRICTED COOLING 
A large airflow vent on the backplate allows exhaust air to pass through directly.

title: HUANUO Dual Monitor Stand - Full Adjustable Monitor Desk Mount Swivel Vesa Bracket with C Clamp, Grommet Mounting Base for 13 to 32 Inch Computer Screens - Each Arm Holds 4.4 to 19.8lbs
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Accessories & Peripherals › Monitor Accessories › Monitor Arms
features: Compatibility: To ensure compatibility with the dual monitor mount, your each monitor must meet three conditions at the same time: First, computer screens size range: 13 to 32 inches. Second, screen weight range: 4.4 to 19.8 lbs. Third, the back of the monitor screen must have VESA mounting holes with a pitch of 75x75mm or 100x100mm. We recommend carefully checking that your monitor meets all three conditions before purchasing. If it's still unclear, you can seek assistance from tech support.

Hold Your Monitor in Place - HNDS6 features a unique structural design that offers a more reasonable product structure compared to other hinge brackets, significantly improving stability. It also provides two desktop installation methods: C-clamp or grommet base. Both options ensure stable and secure fixation for your monitor. At HUANUO, we have always been focused on improving the strength and stability of desktop dual monitor mounts.

Optimize Your View and a Wide Range of Motion - No more bother rotating the angle by adjusting the screw! The gas elastic system desk arm makes it adjust with such smooth action. The monitor stand allows your monitor to swivel, tilt and rotate. Go and freely set your monitors to customized angle and position.

Comfort Is Fundamental - Our dual monitor arm for desk raises monitors to eye level, improving posture, relieving strain on neck & shoulders while increasing productivity levels.Height adjustable, full motion design lets you work in a more comfortable ergonomic position.

Regarding the compatibility with desks, your desk must meet three conditions at the same time: First, desk material: We only recommend wooden desks. Second, desk thickness range: 0.59" - 3.54". Third, the bottom of the desk should not have any cross beams or panels, as this will interfere with installation. We recommend carefully checking that your desk meets all three conditions before purchasing. If you are still unclear, you can seek assistance from tech support.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Features 
Fan Quick Connect 
If there’s a fan problem, you don’t have to return the entire card. SAPPHIRE or our channel partners will send out a replacement fan directly to you! That means they’re easy to remove, clean and replace, with just one screw holding them securely in place. 
Dual ARGB Light Bar 
With tasteful shroud design augmented by ARGB LEDs, you can change the colors of the LED, for a customized design. This can be controlled via TriXX software. Choose from different modes including Fan Speed Mode, PCB Temperature Mode or the colourful rainbow mode or turn off the LEDs. 
External ARGB Control Sync 
Enable the external synchronization of RGB LEDs between the graphics card and the motherboard using the 3-pin header in the tail. Gamers can then choose if the graphics card performs the RGB LED effects independently or if the motherboard acquires control.
